review:
Dr. Anantharaman  was extremely friendly and compassionate when it came to my Ankle and Elbow  injury. He explained everything and made Me feel at ease. I would highly recommend him to anyone... especially those with anxiety about their health and surgeries.

Dr. Anantharaman gave me his professional opinion on the issue, answered all of my questions and left me much better informed about what my condition was and steps I should take to rectify it. His expertise was reassuring, and his manner in conveying the information was very good. He is a smart doctor with high level precision and direct in diagnosis the issues. I have been having Ankle And Elbow pain for 3 months and he gave me a plan of 3 steps before we do a surgery. He also showed where the tears are on both knees on MRI screen. I am to see him in future

This Is about My Mom,who is severely Suffered From Knee Pain Due to an Arthritis,i took her To an Dr Anantharaman He said  that the pain My Mom had was due to arthritis in Her knees. His diagnosis relied primarily on the X-rays taken during the visit by a technician. Answered all my Mom questions and explained the do and don'ts of living with arthritis. Dr. Anantharaman administered the cortisone shots with hardly any discomfort. He did not recommend surgery for the near future.I really Thankful To him.

Dr. Anantharaman  is a board-certified Orthopedic Surgeon in practice in the Rohit Hospital,Sugam Hospital. Dr.Anantharaman who specializes in the care of adult and pediatric athletic injuries. Dr. practices and Owns Acian Orthopedic Clinic Located In  Royapuram.Chennai

Dr. Anantharaman Completed a MS - Orthopedics , Diploma in Orthopedics , FCPS Ortho. He completed an additional year of fellowship training FCPS Ortho and Specialist in arthroscopic (minimally invasive) techniques for shoulder and knee surgery.

ABOUT CLINIC:

The clinic is well maintained and fees also nominal. They take the care of patients and I should give full mark to the physiotherapist who had done a very good job and explained about the exercise. Appointment follow up is excellent.

Friendly and professionaI finally found a specialist that feels like a friend! As a Best Orthopedic Doctor I highly recommend Dr. Annatharaman /Acian Ortho Clinic

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Way of explanation about disease is very good, good ambience, way of behaviour to patients is very excellent.
